text: Bérénice Lim Marlohe (born 19 May 1979) is a French actress. She played Bond girl Sévérine in the twenty-third James Bond movie Skyfall. She was born in Paris. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French voice actors Category:Actors from Paris Category:Actresses who played Bond girls
title: Bérénice Marlohe
